name: Beeknighted64
description:
A short platformer demo inspired by N64 classics. Collect 25 seeds in the level. This is my first attempt at making a game and all visual and audio assets and code were created within 2 weeks for the 32bit Game Jam 2021. After the conclusion of the jam, I will be updating the game with additional features which were cut for time, including more levels and combat. I hope this game will become the base for a larger game in the future. 

Thank you to Dr. Elizabeth Hambleton for supplying the voice of the bee.

Controller recommended, keyboard supported.

Controls (Keyboard or [Xbox/Switch/PS controller]):

Run: WASD or left stick

Walk: hold shift or left trigger

Camera: mouse or right stick

Hover: Space orY/X/Triangle or A/B/Cross

Dodge: RMB or B/A/Circle

Attack: LMB or X/Y/Square

Unlock mouse cursor: Escape or Start
